body: Hi All, Why does energy plus create duplicate surfaces? I reworked on the model again but all my surfaces are getting duplicated. I have attached my file just in case! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx86n2R6kqXIZyPdINncMf9fMIzBxeCWRIKUjfj45J7ukVlptq-b3Q5TCoRqRldv6gRmq8B6*zFuU0e7V-gZiS9k/duplicateSurfaces.PNG)

replies.body:
Hi Vinu, The issue is because you have connected three different zone programs to the same HB zone.
You should use "HB item selector" and it should be fine. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Mu*joc1jlx9246yS4CpS1r*Fifr68RG*OQSMWhueD-LqG6sJ5mLdQFg4gqbySmKyh4qpagld*pJFnG*Gq0yqfLES3y2-jXhZ/ISSUE_SOLVED.png) Best Antonello
Thank you! I forgot that part.
